text: samudra jantuvulanu vetadatam mariyu vatini tinatam, jivanopadhiga miku (sthiranivasulaku) mariyu prayanikulaku dharmasam'matam ceyabadindi. Kani, miru ihram sthitilo unnanta varaku bhumipai vetadatam miku nisedhimpabadindi. Kavuna miru (punarut'thana dinamuna) evari mundu ayite samavesa paraca badataro a allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi
